name: I Wish
description:
Another one of my poetry pieces written from a while ago. It was based on a prompt given to me by an acquaintance. I let myself imagine what the world would be if everyone had a fairy godmother by their side at all times. I was much younger then, and had a much more idyllic worldview than I do now.

Then again, imagine such a world, wouldn't that be something?

After all, if wishes were fishes, wouldn't it be best for them to be free?
